props.activatable: Allows user to mark a node as active by clicking on it
props.active: Syncable prop that allows one to control which nodes are active. The array consists of the `item-key` of each active item.
props.activeClass: The class applied to the node when active
props.color: Sets the color of the active node
props.dense: Decreases the height of the items
props.expandIcon: Icon used to indicate that a node can be expanded
props.hoverable: Applies a hover class when mousing over nodes
props.filter: Custom item filtering function. By default it will use case-insensitive search in item's label.
props.indeterminateIcon: Icon used when node is in an indeterminate state. Only visible when `selectable` is `true`.
props.itemChildren: Property on supplied `items` that contains its children
props.itemDisabled: Property on supplied `items` that contains the disabled state of the item
props.itemKey: Property on supplied `items` used to keep track of node state. The value of this property has to be unique among all items.
props.items: An array of items used to build the treeview
props.itemText: Property on supplied `items` that contains its label text
props.loadChildren: A function used when dynamically loading children. If this prop is set, then the supplied function will be run if expanding an item that has a `item-children` property that is an empty array. Supports returning a Promise.
props.loadingIcon: Icon used when node is in a loading state
props.multipleActive: When `true`, allows user to have multiple active nodes at the same time
props.offIcon: Icon used when node is not selected. Only visible when `selectable` is `true`.
props.onIcon: Icon used when leaf node is selected or when a branch node is fully selected. Only visible when `selectable` is `true`.
props.open: Syncable prop that allows one to control which nodes are open. The array consists of the `item-key` of each open item.
props.openAll: When `true` will cause all branch nodes to be opened when component is mounted
props.openOnClick: When `true` will cause nodes to be opened by clicking anywhere on it, instead of only opening by clicking on expand icon. When using this prop with `activatable` you will be unable to mark nodes with children as active.
props.returnObject: When `true` will make `v-model`, `active.sync` and `open.sync` return the complete object instead of just the key
props.rounded: Provides an alternative active style for `v-treeview` node. Only visible when `activatable` is `true` and should not be used in conjunction with the `shaped` prop.
props.search: The search model for filtering results
props.selectable: Will render a checkbox next to each node allowing them to be selected
props.selectedColor: The color of the selection checkbox
props.selectionType: Controls how the treeview selects nodes. There are two modes available: 'leaf' and 'independent'
props.shaped: Provides an alternative active style for `v-treeview` node. Only visible when `activatable` is `true` and should not be used in conjunction with the `rounded` prop.
props.transition: Applies a transition when nodes are opened and closed
props.value: Allows one to control which nodes are selected. The array consists of the `item-key` of each selected item. Is used with `@input` event to allow for `v-model` binding.

events.input: Emits the array of selected items when this value changes
events.update:active: Emits the array of active items when this value changes
events.update:open: Emits the array of open items when this value changes
